entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3.
